metadata.title: USN-5257-1 -- ldns vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that ldns incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information. (CVE-2020-19860, CVE-2020-19861)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5257-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libldns-dev - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1 libldns2 - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1 python3-ldns - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1 ldnsutils - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1 python-ldns - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1 No subscription required
